软件包 javax.naming.ldap 的分层结构

软件包分层结构：
所有软件包

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.naming.ldap.BasicControl (implements javax.naming.ldap.Control)
      • javax.naming.ldap.ManageReferralControl
      • javax.naming.ldap.PagedResultsControl
      • javax.naming.ldap.PagedResultsResponseControl
      • javax.naming.ldap.SortControl
      • javax.naming.ldap.SortResponseControl
    • javax.naming.ldap.ControlFactory
    • java.util.EventObject (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • javax.naming.ldap.UnsolicitedNotificationEvent
    • javax.naming.InitialContext (implements javax.naming.Context)
      • javax.naming.directory.InitialDirContext (implements javax.naming.directory.DirContext)
        • javax.naming.ldap.InitialLdapContext (implements javax.naming.ldap.LdapContext)
    • javax.naming.ldap.LdapName (implements javax.naming.Name)
    • javax.naming.ldap.Rdn (implements java.lang.Comparable<T>, java.io.Serializable)
    • javax.naming.ldap.SortKey
    • javax.naming.ldap.StartTlsRequest (implements javax.naming.ldap.ExtendedRequest)
    • javax.naming.ldap.StartTlsResponse (implements javax.naming.ldap.ExtendedResponse)
    • java.lang.Throwable (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • java.lang.Exception
        • javax.naming.NamingException
          • javax.naming.ReferralException
            • javax.naming.ldap.LdapReferralException

接口分层结构

  • javax.naming.Context
    • javax.naming.directory.DirContext
      • javax.naming.ldap.LdapContext
  • java.util.EventListener
    • javax.naming.event.NamingListener
      • javax.naming.ldap.UnsolicitedNotificationListener
  • javax.naming.ldap.HasControls
    • javax.naming.ldap.UnsolicitedNotification (并 extends javax.naming.ldap.ExtendedResponse)
  • java.io.Serializable
    • javax.naming.ldap.Control
    • javax.naming.ldap.ExtendedRequest
    • javax.naming.ldap.ExtendedResponse
      • javax.naming.ldap.UnsolicitedNotification (并 extends javax.naming.ldap.HasControls)
